streamlining the software development lifecycle.', 'Security and compliance: Cloud providers typically have strong security and compliance controls in place, providing organizations with peace of mind when it comes to protecting their data and applications.', 'Disaster recovery: Cloud computing resources can be used for disaster recovery, allowing organizations to quickly recover from unexpected events and minimize downtime.', 'Mobile accessibility: Cloud-based applications and services can be accessed from anywhere with an internet connection, making it easier for remote workers and mobile users to stay productive.', 'Real-time collaboration: Cloud computing enables real-time collaboration among teams and stakeholders, regardless of their location.', 'Big data analytics: Cloud computing
